XPrepro.Dakota:
environment tabular_data tabular_data_file = 'dakota.dat'
method multidim_parameter_study partitions = 24 24
model single
interface analysis_drivers = 'run_python_protocol' fork parameters_file = 'delta_Parameters.inc' results_file = 'analysis_Results.out' work_directory named 'work' directory_tag copy_files 'template/*' failure_capture recover = asynchronous evaluation_concurrency =
no_gradients no_hessians
